title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIII, pt. 1156 - Rules Governing Public Access To Records Of The Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority And Niagara Frontier Transit Metro System, Inc
content:

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §§ 1299-e[5], 1299-f; Public Officers Law, § 87[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
